projects.title: All Projects
projects.subtitle: Complete Portfolio Overview
projects.description: Explore my complete portfolio of projects spanning from current commercial work to personal experiments and first experiences.

ovogene-catalog.description: Developed a web platform for donor materials catalog for medical clinics. Created a system with support for multiple brands, each with its own design and settings. Implemented a complex search, filtering, and order management system with a complete cycle from creation to delivery.
highlights: Support for multiple brands in one system
Role and permission system with detailed authorization

mijnzetel.description: Developed a cross-platform application for political news and polls. Created a system with support for iOS, Android, and Web on a single codebase. Implemented authentication, voting system, news feed, and content management through Firebase.

mobile-laundry.description: Developed from scratch a cross-platform mobile application for laundry service. Created an order system with logistics service integration, two-factor authentication, and push notifications. Implemented B2B and B2C segmentation with different registration flows.
mobile-laundry.note: Project name hidden due to NDA

admin-laundry.description: Maintained and developed an administrative panel for laundry service management. Worked with existing Vue.js architecture, added new features for order management, logistics service integration, and notification system.
admin-laundry.note: Project name hidden due to NDA
highlights: Maintenance and development of Vue.js application

driver-passenger-app.description: Conducted migration of web application from Vuetify to Quasar Framework and split a single codebase into several separate cross-platform applications (Web, iOS, Android). Each application now contains one brand. Implemented trip booking system, user profile management, and multilingual support.
driver-passenger-app.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: Migration from Vuetify to Quasar Framework
Splitting single codebase into multiple applications

driver-passenger-admin.description: Maintain and develop a comprehensive administrative panel for transport ecosystem management. Work with existing Vue.js architecture, add new features for trip management, drivers, passengers, and complex pricing system. Admin panel supports multi-brand architecture for managing all brands.
driver-passenger-admin.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: Maintenance and development of Vue.js application
Complex trip and status management system
Multi-brand architecture for managing all brands
Role and permission system (admin, support, finance)
Google Maps integration and analytical charts

driver-passenger-pdf-generator.description: Marked up all HTML templates for PDF invoice generation with support for multiple brands. Set up API endpoints for generating various types of invoices. Worked with existing Node.js microservice, created multi-brand architecture with different templates for each brand and implemented internationalization.
driver-passenger-pdf-generator.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: HTML template markup for PDF generation
API endpoints setup for various invoice types

chartertickets.description: Maintained and developed existing flight booking system with integration of 30+ airlines. Worked with modular architecture on Yii2 Framework, integrated two new partners into the system, maintained API for partners and promo code system. The system included multi-currency, affiliate program, and asynchronous order processing.
highlights: Maintenance and development of existing system
Integration of two new partners into the system
Work with modular Yii2 Framework architecture
API support for partners and promo code system
